title: Drawing, "Design for Rug "First Snow"", 20th century
medium: Graphite, pastel on cream wove textured paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, left margin, upper left:  carry?/dark; center: carry?/dark; right margin, upper right: more/white; center: more white; lower right:  carry dark; scale marked along right edge of drawing; inscribed 4 times, along lower right:  5"; bottom margin:  3"; inscribed in chalk and graphite, lower margin left:  32/5  ok/ 2/5  [unreadable word]; in lower margin, middle:  2/SL [?] 2; lower right: 1/2 W/ Rug/ "First Snow"
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Vertical design with horizontal lines, contained in rectangular boxes, asymetrically spaced on surface.  Fringes of rug indicated at top and bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Rug "First Snow"", 20th century.
20th century. Graphite, pastel on cream wove textured paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-65.
